movie_name: Title : The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè
movie_description: Summary : A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

cast: Cast : Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movie_description: Summary : With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

movie_name: Title : Once Upon a Time in the West
cast: Cast : Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards
movie_description: Summary : A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Richard Harris
movie_description: Summary : Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

movie_name: Title : For a Few Dollars More
cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volontè, Mara Krupp
movie_description: Summary : Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

movie_name: Title : The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
cast: Cast : Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett
movie_description: Summary : Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

movie_name: Title : Killers of the Flower Moon
cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro, Lily Gladstone, Jesse Plemons
movie_description: Summary : When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

movie_name: Title : The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
cast: Cast : James Stewart, John Wayne, Vera Miles, Lee Marvin
movie_description: Summary : A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Mack Swain, Tom Murray, Henry Bergman
movie_description: Summary : A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

cast: Cast : Sanjeev Kumar, Dharmendra, Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan
movie_description: Summary : After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

cast: Cast : Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant
movie_description: Summary : Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter, Domhnall Gleeson
movie_description: Summary : A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movie_name: Title : Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
cast: Cast : Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
movie_description: Summary : In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. After considering their options, they escape to South America.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Dean Martin, Ricky Nelson, Angie Dickinson
movie_description: Summary : A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

cast: Cast : Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Thomas Mitchell, Lloyd Bridges
movie_description: Summary : A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria Volontè, Marianne Koch, Wolfgang Lukschy
movie_description: Summary : A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

cast: Cast : William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Edmond O'Brien
movie_description: Summary : An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

cast: Cast : Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins
movie_description: Summary : In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

directors: Director : George P. Cosmatos, Kevin Jarre
cast: Cast : Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Sam Elliott, Bill Paxton
movie_description: Summary : A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Chief Dan George, Bill McKinney
movie_description: Summary : Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Montgomery Clift, Joanne Dru, Walter Brennan
movie_description: Summary : Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter, Vera Miles, Ward Bond
movie_description: Summary : An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine, John Carradine
movie_description: Summary : A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

cast: Cast : Elizabeth Olsen, Jeremy Renner, Graham Greene, Kelsey Asbille
movie_description: Summary : A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

cast: Cast : Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens, Harvey Korman
movie_description: Summary : In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

cast: Cast : Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Eli Wallach
movie_description: Summary : Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Ben Foster, Logan Lerman
movie_description: Summary : A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

cast: Cast : Henry Fonda, Linda Darnell, Victor Mature, Cathy Downs
movie_description: Summary : After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

cast: Cast : Chris Pine, Ben Foster, Jeff Bridges, Gil Birmingham
movie_description: Summary : Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

cast: Cast : Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Hailee Steinfeld, Josh Brolin
movie_description: Summary : A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

cast: Cast : Elizabeth Taylor, Rock Hudson, James Dean, Carroll Baker
movie_description: Summary : Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

cast: Cast : Robert Redford, Will Geer, Delle Bolton, Josh Albee
movie_description: Summary : A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

cast: Cast : Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur, Van Heflin, Brandon De Wilde
movie_description: Summary : A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Lauren Bacall, Ron Howard, James Stewart
movie_description: Summary : A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

cast: Cast : Rod Steiger, James Coburn, Romolo Valli, Maria Monti
movie_description: Summary : A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

cast: Cast : Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Rene Auberjonois, William Devane
movie_description: Summary : A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond
movie_description: Summary : In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

movie_name: Title : The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard, Mary-Louise Parker
movie_description: Summary : Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

cast: Cast : John Malkovich, Gary Sinise, Ray Walston, Casey Siemaszko
movie_description: Summary : A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan, Charlene Holt
movie_description: Summary : Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

cast: Cast : Johnny Depp, Gary Farmer, Crispin Glover, Lance Henriksen
movie_description: Summary : On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

cast: Cast : Dustin Hoffman, Faye Dunaway, Chief Dan George, Martin Balsam
movie_description: Summary : Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

movie_name: Title : Back to the Future Part III
cast: Cast : Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen, Tom Wilson
movie_description: Summary : Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

cast: Cast : Chris Cooper, Elizabeth Peña, Stephen Mendillo, Stephen J. Lang
movie_description: Summary : When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

cast: Cast : Kevin Costner, Robert Duvall, Diego Luna, Abraham Benrubi
movie_description: Summary : A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

cast: Cast : John Wayne, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Jeremy Slate
movie_description: Summary : A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

cast: Cast : Clint Eastwood, Verna Bloom, Marianna Hill, Mitchell Ryan
movie_description: Summary : A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

movie_name: Title : Yahsi Bati - The Ottoman Cowboys
cast: Cast : Cem Yilmaz, Ozan Güven, Demet Evgar, Zafer Algöz
movie_description: Summary : In 1881, two Ottoman Secret Agents travel to the USA, at the Sultan's request, to deliver a valuable diamond as a gift for the President.

movie_name: Title : The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
cast: Cast : Tim Blake Nelson, Willie Watson, Clancy Brown, Danny McCarthy
movie_description: Summary : Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

cast: Cast : Tim Blake Nelson, Scott Haze, Gavin Lewis, Trace Adkins
movie_description: Summary : An action western about a farmer who takes in an injured man with a satchel of cash. When a posse comes for the money, he must decide who to trust. Defending a siege, he reveals a gunslinging talent calling his true identity into question.
